name: Matt J. Kusner
content: Matt Kusner Bio Curriculum Vitae matt.kusner@gmail.com Matt Kusner I am an Associate Professor at École Polytechnique de Montréal and a Core Academic Member at Mila - Quebec Artificial Intelligence Institute. My current research interests are in the fundamentals of machine learning evaluation and machine learning for society. I am also a member of the European Laboratory for Learning and Intelligent Systems. Previously I was an Associate Professor at at University College London. Before this I was an Associate Professor at the University of Oxford. I was in the first group of Research Fellows at The Alan Turing Institute, and I did my Ph.D. with Kilian Weinberger. I am married to the wonderful Sonia Rego, and am a guardian of the fantastic Karl & Nora. Current graduate students (alumni): Yuchen (Caroline) Zhu (with Ricardo Silva) Jean Kaddour (with Ricardo Silva) Gbètondji Dovonon (with Michael Bronstein) Leo Richter Teaching: INF6953RE: Machine Learning Evaluation Papers Causal Machine Learning: A Survey and Open Problems Jean Kaddour*, Aengus Lynch*, Qi Liu, Matt J.
